---
title: "Requirements"
---

To start this lab, you'll need the following environments:

- **Python**: Anaconda, Anaconda Environment `lab` and Visual Studio Code
- **Working environment**: A folder on your machine called *survey* with two folders in it: *data* and *code* 


:::{.callout-important}
Visit the "[Programming Toolkit-webpage](https://kirenz.github.io/lab-toolkit/)" to learn how to set up the environments.
:::

You also need a [Google Account](https://www.google.com/intl/de/account/about/) if you want to learn how to use *Google Forms*.
